name: Sol Galaxy Defender
description: Third Person Perspective arcade game. Defend your base against hordes of aliens intent on taking over our Solar System.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7xxx or Nvidia Geforce GTX 680 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Woofer recommended
